ygData.subject: Re: RE: Symbol of Trans
ygData.msgSnippet: i concur...my guard has never stacked with spirit armor...although a number have sites said it should...oh well...it would be nice to be wrong on this one.
ygData.messageBody:
i concur...my guard has never stacked with spirit armor...although a number
have sites said it should...oh well...it would be nice to be wrong on this
one.

Dank Skunksage
the Rathe


At 07:59 PM 7/21/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>i might be wrong, but i thought guard was the upgrade to spirit armor?
>
>All grown-ups were once children wrote:
>
>> I think you're missing the point here - the "improvement" of Symbols
>> isn't that they REPLACE <HP/AC Buff + AC Buff> but that they *stack* on
>> top. When I have Bravery, Spirit Armor, Symbol of Ryltan, and Guard on
>> me, I'm able to do some good second-line tanking easily, without
>> worries.
>>
>> --
>> We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind
>> us, with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
>> of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
>>
